July 19, 1902 D Shirebrook Contest
Shirebrook Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Shirebrook Contest shirebrook-contest
Own Choice from a Specified List
Shirebrook, Derbyshire Choice of test pieces: "Euryanthe" or "Songs of Other Days" Prizes: £12 10s, £7, £4, £2 March: 1. Matlock ("La Russe"), 2. Lea Mills ("Third Dragoon Guards") 2nd annual contest 8 bands competed.
Aug. 19, 2013, 10:21 p.m. July 5, 2018, 11:02 p.m.
